attributes.action: Ask the DCMS to consider Ms. Pam Ayres as the next Poet Laureate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The DCMS welcomes the public to write to them with their thoughts on the future of the Poet Laureate's role or with  suggestions for candidates for the Laureateship. This petition asks the Prime Minister to ask the DCMS to consider Ms.Pam Ayres

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with DCMS.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
